original_title: Sri Lanka to establish a High Commission in NZ’s Wellington
original_body_lines: The Sri Lankan government has decided to establish a High Commission in New Zealand’s Wellington in a bid to further bolster the diplomatic relations between the two countries.
Accordingly, the Cabinet of Ministers has green-lighted a resolution made by Minister of Foreign Affairs Ali Sabry in this regard.
The first meeting of the Cabinet of Ministers for the year 2024 was held on Monday (Jan.01).
